column4: umm i need help guys.. i wanna re-record some mp3 files to ogg or FLAC files.. what program should i use?
transcoding sucks, dont encode from a lossy format to another, and dont encode from a lossy format to a lossless
encode from CD to OGG or FLAC is good :)
but encode from CD to MP3 then to Ogg of FLAC is dumb
